lines.text:
[to Crystal, Police Dispatcher]
Uh this is Chopper Fourteen. I think I've spotted the white limo out here uh by the old bean factory...

[picking up hotline phone on news set]
Tony Motta. Yes, Crystal...

[to Tony]
The terrorists have the President's daughter in the old bean factory off the 101.
Yes! Fabulous! Fantastic! Thanks hon' the check's in the mail!
